line.text: 'I bought a ship from the black market. I must go to '
' to get it. Apparently, it's a no-paper kind of deal.'

line.comment: * Activate Yakis if they are fully financed.

line.text: 'They would not accept. You need at least 5 infamy.'
'The Yaki will not be amused. Are you really sure?'
'Stage 3: M6, M7, M8, TM - High corruption.'
'2 ships will appear in the current sector.'
'Yaki arrive immediately and hostile to you.'
'The Yaki rebellion has been fully financed.'

sval.val: I bought a ship from the black market. I must go to
to get it. Apparently, it's a no-paper kind of deal.
They would not accept. You need at least 5 infamy.
The Yaki will not be amused. Are you really sure?
Stage 2: M3, TP, TS - Low corruption.
Stage 3: M6, M7, M8, TM - High corruption.
escaped Yaki slaves seek new employer.
2 ships will appear in the current sector.
Yaki arrive immediately and hostile to you.
The Yaki rebellion has been fully financed.
